name: Blue Bad Yellow Good
description:
Simple game made for the Mini Jam 77

Wave based "action strategy" game 

Left click to move your units: they will auto-target the closest enemy

note that if an unit is engaged in combat, it will not obey your clicks!

Each wave you will have one new unit for each crystal alive

You can't have more than 100 units though

Beat 30 waves without loosing all your crystals to win!

(You can take a screenshot by clicking the mouse wheel button)
